IRPact_modellierung.messaging

Class ConsumerConsumerProductAttributePerceptionManipulationMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.messaging.Message
      • IRPact_modellierung.messaging.ConsumerConsumerProductAttributePerceptionManipulationMessage

  • public class ConsumerConsumerProductAttributePerceptionManipulationMessage
extends Message
    A ConsumerConsumerProductAttributePerceptionManipulationMessage is a message that a ConsumerAgent directs at another ConsumerAgent in order to change their perception about a product attribute, towards their perception of this attribute. It is thus primarily used to model how perceptions are communicated and how the perceptions of other agents are incorporated in ones' own perceptions.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class IRPact_modellierung.messaging.Message

        receiver, sender

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConsumerConsumerProductAttributePerceptionManipulationMessage(ConsumerAgent sender, ConsumerAgent receiver, ProductAttribute productAttributeConcerned, Product productConcerned, double edgeWeightConsumerEdge)
      A ConsumerConsumerProductAttributePerceptionManipulationMessage is a message from the sending agent to the receiving agent about communicating their perception of the productAttributeConcerned of the productConcerned, with the strength of the message effect depending on the edgeWeightConsumerEdge at the time of message creation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getEdgeWeightConsumerEdge() 
      ProductAttribute getProductAttributeConcerned() 
      Product getProductConcerned() 
      void processMessage(double systemTime)
      Processing this message leads to making the receiver of the message aware of the product (if they are not already) and to add the perception of the sending agent at the current time with the strength of the connection between the two agents

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsumerConsumerProductAttributePerceptionManipulationMessage

        public ConsumerConsumerProductAttributePerceptionManipulationMessage(ConsumerAgent sender,
                                                                     ConsumerAgent receiver,
                                                                     ProductAttribute productAttributeConcerned,
                                                                     Product productConcerned,
                                                                     double edgeWeightConsumerEdge)
        A ConsumerConsumerProductAttributePerceptionManipulationMessage is a message from the sending agent to the receiving agent about communicating their perception of the productAttributeConcerned of the productConcerned, with the strength of the message effect depending on the edgeWeightConsumerEdge at the time of message creation. It further has the effect to make the receiver aware of the product if they don't know it yet.
        Parameters:
        sender - The agent sending the respective message
        receiver - The agent receiving the message
        productAttributeConcerned - The productAttribute the message is about
        productConcerned - The product the message communicates about
        edgeWeightConsumerEdge - The strength of the connection between the sender and the receiver

    • Method Detail

      • getProductAttributeConcerned

        public ProductAttribute getProductAttributeConcerned()

      • getEdgeWeightConsumerEdge

        public double getEdgeWeightConsumerEdge()

      • getProductConcerned

        public Product getProductConcerned()

      • processMessage

        public void processMessage(double systemTime)
        Processing this message leads to making the receiver of the message aware of the product (if they are not already) and to add the perception of the sending agent at the current time with the strength of the connection between the two agents
        Specified by:
        processMessage in class Message
        Parameters:
        systemTime - The time at which the message is processed / evaluated
